message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it while it's still worth something!
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy. I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  Think carefully, the value decreases quickly for both of us!
Bob, let's be realistic. Time is money, and it's losing value fast. I'll take my previous offer of 55/45. Don't be stubborn!
